name: Wild Fire (Flat White Canvas, Poishiche, LucaGentilforti)
name_original: Wild Fire (Flat White Canvas, Poishiche, LucaGentilforti)
description:
WARNING : Because of a restart bug you have to reload the page each time you die or else some elements won't spawn !

The forest is burning! Use your water gun to douse flames and jump to safety. But beware… nothing is stable while the wild fire burns.

Gameplay tips:
- Fire the water cannon down to propel yourself up
- Multiply your points by killing multiple enemies while still in the air 

Controls :

Keyboard/mouse :
A/Q = left 

D = right

Space = jump

Left click = shoot

Right click = bubble

Gamepad :

Joystick = move

A = jump

Right trigger = shoot

Left trigger = bubble
